model
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      model.Player

public class Player
extends java.util.Observable

Class that represents a player.

clone

public Player clone()
Returns a Player with all of the same cards as the given player. Used for testing and special checks.

Overrides:
clone in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a new Player identical except in name to this player.

drawDoorCards

public void drawDoorCards(int cards,
                          boolean isFaceUp)
                   throws EndGameException
Draws the given number of Door Cards and allows player to view/play them.

Parameters:
cards - number of cards to draw
isFaceUp - whether or not the cards should be drawn face up or face down.
Throws:
EndGameException - happens when drawn card causes someone to win and ends the game

equipmentItem - the Equipment Card to add and equip.
Returns:
the reason why the card couldn't be equipped; or an empty string if equipped

getCheatingItemCard

public EquipmentCard getCheatingItemCard()
Return the Equipment Card connected to the player's in-play Cheat Card.

the Equipment Card connected to the player's in-play Cheat Card; or null if not using Cheat Card

setCheatCards

public void setCheatCards(OtherDoorCard cheat,
                          EquipmentCard equipment)
Sets the in-play Cheat Card and the Equipment Card it is tied to.

Parameters:
cheat - the Cheat Card to set
equipment - the Equipment Card to be used with the Cheat Card

isCheatingItem

public boolean isCheatingItem(Card card)
Returns whether or not the given card is an EquipmentCard tied to a Cheat Card.

Parameters:
card - card to check
Returns:
true if the given card is an EquipmentCard tied to a Cheat Card; false otherwise

removeCheat

public void removeCheat()
Removes and discards the player's in-play Cheat Card and disconnects it from the Equipment Card it was tied to. Does nothing if player has no in-play Cheat Card.

die

public void die()
Processes the death of the player: he loses everything but level, race, and character class and will need new cards at the beginning of his next turn.
